title: Played ARAM, no longer able to login, can't recieve authentication from server

replies.body: Are you fkn kidding me, legit, i've been fine all night and now the servers are screwed, and you post random shit on my post, which is actaully important, bloody internet trolls, should get banned
mad? By the way they're back up! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
[Boop](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/YIUbbJUR-20160428-client-disconnects-and-login-issues) <- its a link to the official Riot announcement
